1.0.name: wordpress/simply-related-posts
1.0.description:
A widget that simply gives you related posts by taxonomy. It provides four settings to customize every widget and there are no global settings to worry about.

Widget settings

  1. The title of the widget (default: Related Posts)
  2. The taxonomy by which terms the posts are related (default: Tags)
  3. How many related posts to show (default 5)
  4. excludet terms

The widget is visible only when is_single() is true, it doesn't shows up on archives, search templates etc.
